content:
Application.MessageLoopCallback Delegate

Definition

Represents a method that will check whether the hosting environment is still sending messages.

In this Article

[System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsable(System.ComponentModel.EditorBrowsableState.Advanced)]
public delegate bool Application.MessageLoopCallback();
Inheritance
Object
Delegate
Application.MessageLoopCallback
Attributes
EditorBrowsableAttribute

Remarks

This delegate is used with the RegisterMessageLoop method.
